summary: Biology explores the interaction of organisms within ecosystems, which can refer to both natural environments and metaphorical organizational structures. The concept of Ecosystem Architecture reflects the integration of multiple disciplines to manage decentralized, geographically transcendent systems. Though modern ecosystems often extend beyond physical boundaries, the principles of biology provide valuable insights for designing and sustaining these complex networks.
excerpt: Ecosystems now symbolize decentralized, non-linear organizations. Ecosystem Architecture integrates diverse disciplines to craft thriving, boundary-less networks.
